define.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to describe something correctly and thoroughly, and to say what standards, limits, qualities etc it has that make it different from other things
define.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the ability to define clients’ needs
The duties of the post are difficult to define.
The tasks will be clearly defined by the tutor.
70% of the workers can be defined as low-paid.
define.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to explain exactly the meaning of a particular word or idea
define.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I’ll now try to define the term ‘popular culture’.
Define precisely what you mean by ‘crime’.
A budget is defined as ‘a plan of action expressed in money terms’.
define.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to show the edge or shape of something clearly
define.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The bird has sharply defined black and rust markings.
